title:
Easy Sesame Cucumber NoodlesYIELDS 5-6
V
directions: In a medium bowl, whisk together the sesame oil, the soy sauce, rice vinegar, tahini (or peanut butter), honey, ginger, garlic and sriracha.
In a large bowl, toss the cucumber noodles with the sesame sauce. Transfer to a serving bowl and garnish with sesame seeds and scallions.
ingredients: Â¼ cup tahini or creamy peanut butter
4-5 large English cucumbers, Blade C, noodles trimmed*
